name: Variable Initialization Test
message: Time must start at 30 seconds.

name: Bowl Movement Test
message: Bowl must move to the left when left arrow key is pressed.

name: Bowl Movement Details Test
message: Bowl must move to the left when left arrow key is pressed.

name: Apple Falling Test
message: Apple must fall down.

name: Apple Falling Details Test
message: Apple must fall down.

name: Banana Falling Test
message: Banana must fall down.

name: Banana Falling Details Test
message: Banana must fall down.

name: Apple Spawn Test
message: At least three Apples must have spawned after 30 seconds.

name: Apple Spawn Random X Position Test
message: At least three Apples must have spawned after 30 seconds.

name: Apple Spawn Y Position Test
message: At least three Apples must have spawned after 30 seconds.

name: Banana Spawn Test
message: At least three Bananas must have spawned after 30 seconds.

name: Banana Spawn Random X Position Test
message: At least three Bananas must have spawned after 30 seconds.

name: Banana Spawn Y Position Test
message: At least three Bananas must have spawned after 30 seconds.

name: Only One Apple Test
message: At least three Apples must have spawned after 30 seconds.

name: Only One Banana Test
message: At least three Bananas must have spawned after 30 seconds.

name: Banana Fall Delay Test
message: Banana must not be visible for a second in the beginning.

name: Banana Ground Delay Test
message: Banana didn't touch the ground in 30 seconds.

name: Apple Points Test
message: Apple must have touched the bowl after five seconds.

name: Apple Game Over Test
message: Apple must have touched the ground after five seconds.

name: Apple Game Over Message Test
message: Apple must have touched the ground after five seconds.

name: Banana Bowl Points Test
message: Banana didn't touch the bowl after 30 seconds.

name: Banana Ground Points Test
message: Banana didn't touch the ground after 30 seconds.

name: Banana Ground Message Test
message: Banana didn't touch the ground after 30 seconds.

name: Timer Tick Test
message: Time must decrease by one every second.

name: Timer Game Over Test
message: Game must not be over after 5 seconds.

name: Timer Game Over Message Test
message: Bowl must display a message when the time is up.
